text: "Red Star Shines" () is a Chinese patriotic song depicting the revolutionary war against the Kuomintang by the Communist Party of China. The song is the theme song of the 1974 red classic movie Shining Red Star (). ==Lyrics== {| class="wikitable" !width="150"|Simplified Chinese !!width="320"| Pinyin !!
